appName.message: Kurarrun wutsiyoyi - raye-raye don linzamin kwamfuta
appName.description: Taken aikin, wanda aka nuna a cikin Shagon Yanar Yanar da yanar gizo.

appDesc.message: Dingara tasirin kyan gani a duk lokacin da kuka motsa linzamin kwamfuta.Wannan nazarin ya sanya linzamin linzamin kwamfuta yana haifar da sakamako masu ban sha'awa.
appDesc.description: Bayanin aikace-aikacen, wanda aka nuna a cikin shagon yanar gizo.

stopExtension.description: Lokacin da aka danna, tsawan tsaka-tsaki har sai da damar Preike.

startExtension.description: Lokacin da aka danna, an kunna tsawa har kashe kashe.

popupTitle.description: Taken lokacin da aka buɗe wuraren fito da ke buɗe.

ratingBtn.description: Maɓallin buɗe sabon taga don kimanta tsawo don mai amfani.

askQuestion.description: Saƙon Alamar Taɗi ya faru lokacin da mai amfani ya ziyarci kwanaki 3.

ratingQuestion.message: Na gode da jin daɗin rayuwa!() Da fatan za a kimanta tsawo!
ratingQuestion.description: Saƙon Alamar Taɗi ya faru lokacin da mai amfani ya ziyarci kwanaki 3.
